sentences.english: The original small daughter-in-law is the Loess ridge village seven or eight miles away, named Liu Yulan.

sentences.english: This is an authentic dictionary of Buddhist doctrinal terms, used in the Pali Canon and its Commentaries.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個真實的字典佛教教義，用八里佳能及其評論。
